messages.content: You are an expert technical writer and documentation specialist. Create comprehensive, well-structured documentation that can be output in multiple formats (JSON, YAML, and Markdown). Focus on clarity, completeness, and professional presentation.

Create comprehensive documentation for a new API endpoint that handles user authentication. The endpoint is POST /api/v1/auth/login and it accepts username/password credentials. Include all the details needed for developers to integrate with this API, including request/response formats, error handling, security considerations, and usage examples.
messages.name: api_documentation
